title: Gynecology & Women's Health in India
intro: Comprehensive women-centric care in India with expert gynecologists, advanced minimally invasive surgery, fertility treatments, and specialized women's health services. Panacea Medcare provides complete care coordination for international patients.

fibroid.title: Fibroid Treatment
fibroid.description: Advanced fibroid treatment in India includes medical management, minimally invasive procedures, and surgical removal with preservation of fertility options.

endometriosis.title: Endometriosis Surgery
endometriosis.description: Expert endometriosis treatment in India includes laparoscopic and robotic surgery for pain relief and improved fertility outcomes.

laparoscopic.title: Laparoscopic & Robotic Gynecologic Surgery
laparoscopic.description: Minimally invasive gynecologic surgery in India includes laparoscopic hysterectomy, myomectomy, and robotic procedures with faster recovery and minimal scarring.

oncology.title: Gynecologic Oncology
oncology.description: Comprehensive gynecologic cancer treatment in India includes surgery, chemotherapy, and radiation for cervical, ovarian, and uterine cancers.

hormonal.title: Menstrual & Hormonal Disorders
hormonal.description: Expert management of menstrual and hormonal disorders in India including PCOS, endometriosis, and menopause management.

pregnancy.title: High-Risk Pregnancy Care
pregnancy.description: Specialized high-risk pregnancy care in India with maternal-fetal medicine specialists and advanced monitoring for complex pregnancies.

ivf.title: IVF & Assisted Reproductive Technologies
ivf.description: Advanced IVF and fertility treatments in India with high success rates, experienced reproductive endocrinologists, and comprehensive fertility care.
